definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
citron daylily (Hemerocallis citrina Baroni)/golden needles (edible flower)
gelidiella, tropical and subtropical red algae
lit. the dishes are cold (idiom)/fig. to arrive late/to take one's sweet time
pinyin: huang2 hua1 cai4 dou1 liang2 le5

sentences.english: Qidong people have cultivated daylily for over five hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 黃花菜在祁東縣的種植已有500多年的歷史。

sentences.english: Potatoes and cauliflower tend to turn brown when boiling, especially when you're having company for dinner.
sentences.chinese: 土豆和花菜在水煮的時候容易變成咖啡色。

sentences.english: This is because the water content of fresh day lily have Colchicine can cause poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲鮮黃花菜中含水量有秋水仙鹼，會引起中毒。

sentences.english: Opportunities and threats are both waiting for Qidong daylily.
sentences.chinese: 祁東黃花菜的發展是機遇與挑戰並存。

sentences.english: People often say, day lily is "lotos" for it can "soothe the nerves."
sentences.chinese: 人們常說，黃花菜是“忘憂草”，能安神解鬱。

sentences.english: Furnished a new method to multipurpose use the day lily.
sentences.chinese: 爲綜合利用黃花菜資源提供了一種新的方式。

sentences.english: Day lily is a traditional hi eat vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 黃花菜是人們喜喫的一種傳統蔬菜。

sentences.english: The aim of this paper was to research the antifungal and antioxidant activities of Gelidium amansii.
sentences.chinese: 本實驗研究了石花菜醇提物的抑菌活性和抗氧化活性。

sentences.english: Daylily lotus soup, tender crisp scent, cools the blood detoxification.
sentences.chinese: 藕拌黃花菜，清香嫩脆，涼血解毒。

sentences.english: Foie Gras, Caulif_lower Puree, Shallots, Bacon and Red Wine Sauce.
sentences.chinese: 煎鮮貝和鵝肝配花菜泥，炸小幹蔥，培根和紅酒汁。

sentences.english: The main dominant species of predator were Theridion octomaculatum and Erigonidium graminicolum.
sentences.chinese: 害蟲和天敵的優勢種主要分佈於花菜外層葉反面。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Broccoli seed was the optimum material for preparing sulforaphane.
sentences.chinese: 結論青花菜種子是製備萊菔硫烷的優良原材料。

sentences.english: Do you also like to eat broccoli?
Broccoli is a cancer-preventing superfood, one you should eat frequently.
sentences.chinese: 花菜是超強抗癌的食物，你應該經常喫它們。

sentences.english: I find the very sight of raw broccoli and cauliflower on a buffet table dispiriting.
sentences.chinese: 看到冷餐桌上那些生的花椰菜和花菜我就倒胃口。

sentences.english: The photosynthetic property of several varieties of broccoli was studied.
sentences.chinese: 對青花菜幾個品種的光合特性作了研究。

definition: variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
